name: Healthcare
description: Prompts for healthcare administrators, practice managers, and health sector professionals in New Zealand

prompts.title: Patient Communication Template
prompts.content:
Create a patient communication for [Communication Type].

Healthcare Provider: [Practice/Organisation Name]
Communication Type: [Appointment Reminder/Results/Follow-up/etc.]
Patient Context: [General/Specific Condition]

Key Information to Convey:
[List Key Points]

Tone: [Empathetic/Informative/Urgent]

NZ Health Context:
- Relevant health regulations
- Te Tiriti considerations
- Cultural sensitivity requirements

Generate:
1. Primary communication text
2. Simplified version (health literacy appropriate)
3. Key action items highlighted
4. Contact information template
5. Privacy statement if applicable

prompts.title: Clinical Policy Document
prompts.content:
Draft a clinical policy document for [Policy Topic].

Organisation: [Healthcare Organisation]
Policy Area: [Policy Topic]
Applicable Standards: [List Standards - e.g., HDSS, ACC, etc.]

Current Practice:
[Describe Current State]

Proposed Changes:
[List Changes]

Stakeholders:
[List Affected Parties]

NZ Regulatory Framework:
- Health and Disability Services Standards
- Privacy Act requirements
- Te Tiriti o Waitangi obligations

Create a policy including:
1. Purpose and scope
2. Policy statement
3. Definitions
4. Procedures
5. Roles and responsibilities
6. Related documents
7. Review schedule
8. Approval sign-off template

prompts.title: Staff Roster Optimisation
prompts.content:
Optimise staff rostering for [Department/Practice].

Organisation: [Name]
Department: [Department]
Staff Count: [Number]
Operating Hours: [Hours]

Staff Mix:
[List Roles and Numbers]

Demand Patterns:
[Describe Peak Times]

Constraints:
- NZ Employment law requirements
- Union agreements if applicable
- Leave balances
[List Other Constraints]

Generate:
1. Optimal roster structure
2. Shift pattern recommendations
3. Coverage analysis
4. Fatigue risk considerations
5. Holiday/leave integration
6. Cost efficiency analysis
7. Contingency planning

prompts.title: Quality Improvement Initiative
prompts.content:
Design a quality improvement initiative for [Focus Area].

Organisation: [Healthcare Organisation]
Focus Area: [QI Topic]
Current Performance: [Baseline Data]
Target Performance: [Goal]

Stakeholders:
[List Stakeholders]

Resources Available:
[List Resources]

Timeline: [Project Duration]

NZ Quality Framework:
- Health Quality & Safety Commission alignment
- Relevant clinical indicators

Create a QI plan including:
1. Problem statement
2. Aim statement (SMART)
3. Current state analysis
4. Root cause analysis
5. Change ideas (PDSA cycles)
6. Measures (outcome, process, balancing)
7. Implementation plan
8. Sustainability approach

prompts.title: Funding Application Template
prompts.content:
Prepare a funding application for [Programme/Service].

Organisation: [Healthcare Provider]
Funding Source: [e.g., Te Whatu Ora, PHO, ACC, etc.]
Programme: [Programme Name]
Funding Amount: [Requested Amount]

Service Description:
[Describe the Service]

Target Population:
[Who Will Benefit]

Expected Outcomes:
[List Outcomes]

NZ Health Priorities:
- Alignment with NZ Health Strategy
- Equity considerations
- Maori health outcomes

Generate:
1. Executive summary
2. Needs assessment
3. Service model description
4. Implementation plan
5. Budget breakdown
6. Outcomes framework
7. Risk assessment
8. Evaluation approach
